General.Name: Hong Ri Da Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: HONG RI DA Technology Company Limited manufactures and sells connectors. The company offers mobile phone and memory cards, and battery holders; headphone socket, USB, FPC, BTB, and RF connectors; USB type C and antenna shrapnel series; and MIM processing products. It also provides computer and automotive connectors, wiring harnesses, multimedia connectors, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered Kunshan, China.
